sent.orig: The fifth chapter carries on the appraisal to the fund achievement from achievement endurance.
sent.trans: 文章的第五章从基金业绩是否具有持续性对基金业绩进行评估。

sent.orig: Junior Achievement Incorporated and Junior Achievement International combined their operations in 2004.
sent.trans: 青年商业社联合集团和青年商业社国际公司在2004年合并了业务。

sent.orig: The points awarded for significant achievement is 15 and for exceptional achievement 25.
sent.trans: 5为重要的成就计分15，非凡的成就25。

sent.orig: And Sir Henry off, calling for his wife and see his achievement-his achievement of simplicity.
sent.trans: 亨利爵士跑了起来，叫他的妻子来看他的成功之作--他的单纯纯朴的成功之作。

sent.orig: They believed that will choose Shenzhen, the achievement future, an achievement more magnificent future!
sent.trans: 他们相信，选择深圳，成就未来，成就一个更加辉煌的未来！
